com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs

Class RequireTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • TagSupport
      • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.RequireTag

  • public class RequireTag
extends TagSupport
    RequireTag Evaluates the acl and if true exposes its body.

     <rhn:require acl="acl_to_evaluate(params_to_acl)">
  <h2>JSP or HTML tags to be evaluated if above acl is valid</h2>
     Otherwise, everything between the tag will be ignored.
 </rhn:require>
